writer.name: 詹卢卡·玛塔瑞斯 Gianluca Matarrese

director.name: 詹卢卡·玛塔瑞斯 Gianluca Matarrese

introduction: Growing up silently Queer, within a broken family, Kurtis faced abuse, trauma and addiction. As an escape, he discovered Beauty within his rural upbringing. Eventually unveiling places beyond his wildest dreams he created his alter-ego, Miss Fame, becoming one of the World’s most iconic supermodel drag. A hypnosis session takes us on Kurtis/Miss Fame’s journey into their mind, exploring their salvatory yet torturous relationship to Pain and Beauty.
